## What is Zawgyi Font?
 
Zawgyi font is a Unicode font that was created by Zaw Win Htut, a Myanmar computer expert and developer. Zawgyi font is designed to make typing in Myanmar language easier and faster. It has a simple and elegant style that resembles the traditional Myanmar script. Zawgyi font supports all the characters and symbols of Myanmar language, including the complex consonant clusters and diacritics. Zawgyi font also has a keyboard layout that is similar to the QWERTY keyboard, making it convenient for users who are familiar with the English keyboard.
